topic.title: Anybody can help me configure max_size of my site?
topic.body:
ZeroRandom: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BmDLy9bzNM33GuJCtwH1V5LN3KygH2WPh/

Error in signSite:
Site:1BmDLy..2WPh content.json: Site too large 23216231 > 10485760, aborting task...
Site:1BmDLy..2WPh Sign failed: Invalid content

6_16w7UuJAHbt8YBa8zxHS7UFk9mq8Q5DpE4.body:
BUMP!

Error in signSite:
Site:1BmDLy..2WPh content.json: Site too large 23216231 > 10485760, aborting task...
Site:1BmDLy..2WPh Sign failed: Invalid content

By: ZeroRandom: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BmDLy9bzNM33GuJCtwH1V5LN3KygH2WPh/

> [kopykate](#comment_41_16w7UuJAHbt8YBa8zxHS7UFk9mq8Q5DpE4): That is a huge site .. lol
> It's very easy to increase the size limit of the site as a whole .. just go to the site control panel and set the new size limit. What's tricky is increasing the kb allowance of individual users.

Where is control panel?
Fixed using option "--size_limit size" in command-line.

3_1Psc4YYyrL4T8gnPfQCTyh1b7kTuBuDAEY.body: Fixed using option "--size_limit size" in command-line.
